title: Champion Reveal: Tahm Kench, the River King

replies.body: GROMP: THE CHAMPION.
More like Scuttlegromp, the champion.
Future skin?
If he does not get a golden koi skin its a crime against existence.
He has a top hat, you can trust him to eat you
eat you like a sir
More like a catfish not a frog geez it's like you're not from the south or something ;)
A voodoo catfish, by the look of it. Gotta have a witchdoctor skin with his face painted like a skull. Think Dr. Facilier
I guess you can say he is... an "AD carry" ;){{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
What if Tahm eats {{champion:429}} at the exact same moment she ultis?
That's a really good question! Checking it out now to see if we need to special case something.
I checked! Whoever presses their button first their ability goes through and blocks the other one. Phew.
Can Tahm eat {{champion:429}} while {{champion:429}} has an ally inside of her?
I believe th' term, when that happens, is called a _Clown Car._

Thanks for the confirmation. If you don't mind answering a couple other questions:

So he can't take a lantern or use movement abilities while chomping down on an enemy, but can he take a lantern with an _ally_ in his gut? I can only imagine the massive plays coming out of this with a Tahm Kench top, Sej/Gragas jungle and Thresh support.

If someone jumps in for the long Voyage, can he troll and drop them off in the enemy team's base, TPing himself out to safety? (It made me think of Io from Dota 2.)

Can a Kalista respond to his trolling by ulting him (if he's bound) to keep him from TPing out?

Can he jungle?

And most importantly (and the only reason I play Mundo), how well does he work when stacking Warmogs?
can we give him an actual good lore pls
How did you like the reveal video? Does that count as lore?

You could say it's 
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)>   ⌐■-■

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)>⌐■-■ 

┌(▀Ĺ̯▀)┐

just a taste

You could say the community has an
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)> ⌐■-■

┌(▀Ĺ̯▀)┐

Appetite for a good lore

You could say that I'm
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)> ⌐■-■

┌(▀Ĺ̯▀)┐

Eating this thread up.

It counts, but it also needs to be translated to in game client. Most reveal trailers are left behind when we get a couple lines of "lore." Just want to see more of a backstory about him and not just what he does like the trailer shows.
Mid or Feed just took on a completely different meaning.
Champions are friends, not food
Scuttle crab confirmed champion??
Scuttle Gromp. Don't ask what happened.
Why do people keep calling him Gromp or a crab? He's obviously a big, fat, bayou catfish with a top hat and i think that's wonderful
This is papa support. When your ad(child) runs off, you say "no no, get back here son" and proceed to win game.
About time supports were able to keep their ADC on a stricter leash.
It's pretty strong!
oh no, not more op than _Garlic Bread___

But it shall never reach the point of being more OP than SLICED BREAD!!!!!

At least for the sake of all we know and love....I hope not...
But. Will it be more OP than SLICED GARLIC BREAD?

Early invades in the jungle?

Tahm starts with devour, gains three stacks on the enemy junglier/adc/support, and thresh throws a lantern, Tahm devours his target, waddles over to the lantern, grabs it, and easy first blood.

xD

I can't wait to pull this off.
You can't use lantern with an enemy inside of you :(
I'm just wondering what champions he'll interact with.. Hopefully some {{champion:4}} ,{{champion:105}} and maybe hit on {{champion:267}}
There are... a number of champion specific taunts. I'll leave it up to you guys to find them all!

This champ reminds me of when I used to play Kirby in Super Smash Bros, and I'd suck people up and jump off the ledges of Hyrule Temple. 

Oh the nostalgia is real.....
Kirby skin incoming.
Who is responsible for that hat? Because I love it!

Chris Campbell aka Skeeziks did the concept art on Tahm together with Gem Lim aka Lonewingy. I think Gem came up with the idea of having a hat at all (it was a Fez at first!) and Chris turned it into the hat it is today.
Fez's are cool....
Important question: Does devour keep an enemy in his stomach long enough for him to teleport somewhere, like perhaps to a nexus turret?
Teleport and flash are disabled with a unit in your belly.
What about {{summoner:32}} ?
YOSHI SKIN PLS

Alright, I sent in an app months ago to apply for a summer internship at Riot Games in California. In it, I mentioned an idea about a champion that has a pouch for allies to jump in, something I had been theory crafting for awhile (kangaroo-ish, but albeit jumping behind, or away, from approaching enemies with the ally safely inside). Anyway, THIS IS AMAZING. Def not my idea but maybe I may have prophesied this in my own little way, I mean I only told Riot about it LOL.

SWEET CHAMP RIOT! Love this! inb4 seen in LCS 3 weeks after his release. :3
Yeah--devour in any shape or form has been a thing we've been keen to get on a kit for a while. It was on Gnar's kit last year.
I take it from the lack of jungling mention he's tuned like Alistar and Leona to have too slow a clear to be a fully viable jungler?
Yeah, his first clear particularly is very, very slow.
